Title: The Six Thatchers
Writer: Mark Gatiss, Mark Gatiss (created by), Steven Moffat (created by), Arthur Conan Doyle (based on the works of)
Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs, Rupert Graves
Plot: Sherlock takes on the case of finding out who is going around and smashing six unique head statues of late Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher.
